title: Promos glitch help pls
body: I was in promos it even said it, I lost my first promo and it didn't count as a loss in my promos it just deducted lp. Could you fix this? or help?

replies.body: Even when in a series,  LP is still adjusted with each match.  Looking into this for you it looks like your first series match resulted in a loss, where you went 1/16/15 as Zilean if you'd like to locate that match.  I don't see anything out of the ordinary here!  Let me know if that clears things up!

yeah it was weird when I lost the game it didn't show the x as a loss, as if I wasn't in my promos but then I played another ranked and it was fine. Just a glitch I guessthanks for responding though :) I'm just bad at this game as  you can tell
